summary: The document is an agent report from the 108th CIC Group, dated 27 October 1958, focusing on Robert Scheer, a pre-inductee born in April 1936 in Bronx, New York. It outlines Scheer's employment as a waiter at Hilltop Lodge during July and August 1953, his commendable performance, and his eligibility for rehire. The report incorporates insights from Paul Wolfson, a former co-owner of Hilltop Lodge, regarding Scheer's employment and character.
key_findings: Robert Scheer was employed as a waiter at Hilltop Lodge in the summer of 1953.
Scheer was described as an honest, trustworthy, and reliable employee by his former employer.
The document includes Scheer's personal details such as his date of birth, place of birth, and social security number.
The report was compiled by PAUL F. ROHDE of the 108th CIC Group based on information provided by Paul Wolfson.
The document was classified as 'UNCLASSIFIED' and was 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS'.
